name: YouTube Darkify
description: This style gives YouTube a cleaner look and it's easier on your eyes
additional_info:
Version 0.1.3
Initials: MP


Tested support: Google Chrome.
Last tested YouTube version date: 2015-09-07.

Version History:
0.1.3 (2015-09-11): Changed some styles for users who's not logged in.
0.1.2 (2015-09-07): Minor link style-change.
0.1.1 (2015-09-07): Added a grayscale filter on the YouTube logo so it would fit the rest of the theme. 
0.1 (2015-09-07): First release...
